value:
select SSEGURO,
		COD_PRODUCTO,
		PRODUCTO ,
		COD_PLAN,
		PLAN,
		max_sid
from
(select SSEGURO,
		COD_PRODUCTO,
		PRODUCTO ,
		COD_PLAN,
		PLAN,
		row_number()over(partition by SRC.SSEGURO order by SRC.rec_crt_dtm desc ) as row_cnt,
		LKP_MAX_KEY.max_sid 
		from
(


SELECT    T1.POLIZA  || '-' || T1.ITEM AS SSEGURO,
		T2.ITE_SMA_SUBRAMO AS COD_PRODUCTO,
		T3.descripcion AS PRODUCTO,
		T2.ITE_INT_PRODPLAN AS COD_PLAN,
		T4.descripcion AS PLAN,
		T1.policy_issue_date as rec_crt_dtm
FROM	cdp_stg_dwh.BASE_PENTA T1
LEFT JOIN cdp_ods.bd_produ_x_pro_item  T2
ON T1.POLIZA = T2.ITE_INT_POLIZA
AND T1.ITEM = T2.ITE_SMA_ITEM
LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM cdp_ods.prdcdg_prd_plnproducto WHERE idRamo = 9) T3
ON T2.ITE_SMA_SUBRAMO = T3.idProducto
LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM cdp_ods.prdcdg_prd_plnplan  WHERE     idRamo       = 9) T4
ON T3.idProducto = T4.idProducto
AND T2.ITE_INT_PRODPLAN = T4.idPlan

) SRC
left outer join 
(select 1 dummy,max(productos_penta_key) max_sid  from  cdp_stg_dwh.productos_penta ) LKP_MAX_KEY
on LKP_MAX_KEY.dummy=1)
where SSEGURO is not null and row_cnt=1
